[ti:You Say]
[ar:Lauren Daigle]
[al:You Say]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]You Say - Lauren Daigle (劳伦·戴格尔)
[00:15.35]I keep fighting voices
[00:17.81]In my mind that say I'm not enough
[00:22.79]
[00:28.12]Every single lie that tells me
[00:31.40]I will never measure up
[00:36.30]
[00:41.05]Am I more than just the sum
[00:44.13]Of every high and every low
[00:48.99]
[00:53.63]Remind me once again just who I am
[00:58.06]Because I need to know
[01:01.62]
[01:03.15]Ohhh
[01:04.84]
[01:05.44]You say I am loved when I can't feel a thing
[01:10.93]
[01:11.81]You say I am strong when I think I am weak
[01:17.53]
[01:18.25]You say I am held when I am falling short
[01:23.96]
[01:24.79]When I don't belong oh you say that I am yours
[01:30.66]
[01:31.94]And I believe I oh I believe
[01:37.09]I
[01:37.95]What you say of me I
[01:41.21]
[01:41.96]I believe
[01:43.52]
[01:45.43]The only thing that matters now is everything
[01:50.59]You think of me
[01:53.94]
[01:58.74]In you I find my worth in

[02:09.77]

[02:45.92]
[02:46.53]Oh I believe
[02:48.75]
[02:54.33]Taking all I have and now I'm laying it at your feet
[03:02.05]

[03:10.39]And you'll have every victory
